ArticHost: Host in Chicago on Replicated SAN Storage Starting at $3.19/mo!

artichost, cheap dedi, oklahoma April 26, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Here’s a pretty cool offer from ArticHost, featuring both an unusual locale and some technology we don’t see every day.

  • Get a VPS in Chicago that lives on replicated SSD SAN Storage starting at only $3.19/mo (using the promo code below)!
  • Or get an E3 dedi in exotic (OK, well, in the sense that it’s not common!) Oklahoma City with unlimited transfer, DDoS protection, and IPMI starting at $70/mo!

Neat!  We last had ArticHost on back in January 28, 2021 and this time they’re offering Linux VPSes and a dedicated server as well.

They are registered in as Pinged Networks, Inc in Oklahoma, USA (EIN: 82-5246345). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Credit Card, Paypal, and Bitcoin.

Here’s a little about ArticHost in their own words:

ArticHost LLC provides unmanaged VPS and Dedicated Server plans. As stated earlier all of our VPS are stored on an SSD SAN appliance. Most VPS providers just use local storage and do not back up your VPS; we do it differently. All of our VPS reside on a SAN appliance that gets replicated to a redundant one nightly.

The LEB community thrives on reports from our readers about the companies they patronize, so please comment below about your experience with ArticHost.

Now read more to see the offers!
